Comment: This is a move I don't like. I'm not very familiar with the Sicilian and I often find myself in a tough spot when opponents use it... (It is intentional to say it out loud in this annotation... I want people to use it against me so I'll practice it and since then I got to play the Sicilian quite a few times)

At this point I decided I would be better to castle queen side and take advantage of the fact he will most likely castle on the king side to launch an attack with my pawns... I also wanted to avoid the pin by Bg4
I was really happy to see him do this
